LanguageData.VFE_TableMachiningLarge.label: великий верстат
LanguageData.VFE_TableMachiningLarge.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools and enough space to produce technological marvels from simpler materials in shorter amounts of time. Consumes power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableMachiningLarge_Blueprint.label: large machining table (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableMachiningLarge_Frame.label: large machining table (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableMachiningLarge_Frame.descriptio: A workbench equipped with advanced tools and enough space to produce technological marvels from simpler materials in shorter amounts of time. Consumes power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableSmithyLarge.label: велика електрична куззня
LanguageData.VFE_TableSmithyLarge.description: An electric-powered work center for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableSmithyLarge_Blueprint.label: large electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableSmithyLarge_Frame.label: large electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableSmithyLarge_Frame.description: An electric-powered work center for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableStoveLarge.label: велика електрична плита
LanguageData.VFE_TableStoveLarge.description: A large size manufacturing stove as well as multiple ovens to prepare meals and cook significantly faster.
LanguageData.VFE_TableStoveLarge_Blueprint.label: large stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableStoveLarge_Frame.label: large stove (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableStoveLarge_Frame.description: A large size manufacturing stove as well as multiple ovens to prepare meals and cook significantly faster.
LanguageData.VFE_TableTailorLarge.label: великий електричний стіл кравця
LanguageData.VFE_TableTailorLarge.description: A large size manufacturing workbench with several tools for designers and a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 33% of normal speed.
LanguageData.VFE_TableTailorLarge_Blueprint.label: large tailoring table (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableTailorLarge_Frame.label: large tailoring table (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableTailorLarge_Frame.description: A large size manufacturing workbench with several tools for designers and a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 33% of normal speed.
